name: aluminium oxide, metallurgical, import from Rest of Europe | aluminium oxide, metallurgical | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21136/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported primary aluminium oxide metallurgical from Rest of Europe to EU27 & EFTA. The import value is valid for 2015 and includes all  imports, independently whether used within the importing region, or re-exported.

The activity starts at the factory gate with the product ready for transport.

This activity includes the transport from the exporting region (including transport within the region) to EU27 & EFTA.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

flow.name: aluminium oxide, metallurgical
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

exchanges.description:
Estimated value. Data set equal to average transport distances within the region of Europe. The data for Europe is extracted from the 2018 European aluminium association ENVIRONMENTAL
PROFILE REPORT. Life-Cycle inventory data for aluminium production and transformation processes in Europe. Accessible from: https://www.european-aluminium.eu/
